rows.name: Holy Visions
rows.description: Visions of your god plague your senses. Attempt an Average (+20) Endurance Test. If you fail gain one @Condition[Stunned] Condition. The GM determines what the visions may be.

rows.name: Think Over Your Deeds
rows.description: Any successful Pray test cannot achieve more than +0 SL for the next week.

rows.name: Heed My Lessons
rows.description: You suffer a penalty of -10 to your Pray Skill for the next [[1d10]]+Sin points Rounds.

rows.name: Prove Your Devotion
rows.description: Gain the @Condition[Prone] Condition. This Condition is not removed until you score a Success with an Average (+20) Pray Test.

rows.name: You Try My Patience
rows.description: You cannot enact any Pray Tests for [[1d10]] Rounds.

rows.name: You Do Not Understand My Intent
rows.description: You suffer a penalty of -10 to any Skills associated with your deity (as determined by the GM) for the next [[1d10]]+Sin points hours.

rows.name: I Find Your Lack of Faith Disturbing
rows.description: You cannot enact any Pray Tests for [[1d10]]+Sin points Rounds.

rows.name: Share My Pain
rows.description: You suffer 1+Sin points Wounds, ignoring Toughness Bonus and APs. Also attempt an Average (+20) Endurance Test. If you fail gain one @Condition[Stunned] Condition.

rows.name: Your Cause is Unworthy
rows.description: Your targets gain the @Condition[Prone] condition. Any Blessings or Miracles of your deity targeting them automatically fail for the next [[1d10]]+Sin points days.

rows.name: Cease Your Prattling
rows.description: You cannot enact any Pray Tests for the next [[2d10]]+Sin points rounds.

rows.name: Feel My Wrath
rows.description: You suffer [[1d10]]+Sin points Wounds. Also attempt a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test. If you fail gain one @Condition[Stunned] Condition.

rows.name: I Shall Not Aid You
rows.description: You suffer a penalty of -10 to a Skill associated with your deity (as determined by the GM) for the next [[1d10]]+Sin Points days.

rows.name: Divine Wounds
rows.description: Gain 1+Sin points @Condition[Bleeding] conditions.

rows.name: Struck Blind
rows.description: Gain the @Condition[Prone] Condition. Gain 1+Sin point @Condition[Blinded] Conditions, which can only be removed by passing a Challenging (+0) Pray Test, with Success removing 1 + SL @Condition[Blinded] Conditions.

rows.name: What Will You Sacrifice?
rows.description: You suffer [[1d10]]+Sin points Wounds, ignoring Toughness Bonus and APs. Also attempt a Difficult (-10) Endurance Test. If you fail gain one @Condition[Stunned] Condition.

rows.name: You Have Sinned Against Me
rows.description: Your god is extremely annoyed and forces you to you enact Pray Tests as your Action for the next [[1d10]]+Sin Points Rounds as a penance.

rows.name: Purge the Flesh
rows.description: You suffer [[2d10]]+Sin points Wounds, ignoring Toughness Bonus and APs. Also attempt a Hard (-20) Endurance Test. If you fail gain one @Condition[Stunned] Condition. If you fail with -4 SL or fewer, gain an @Condition[Unconscious] Condition that lasts a minimum of [[1d10]] Rounds.

rows.name: Daemonic Interference
rows.description: The Dark Gods answer your pleas instead of your patron. [[1d10]] Lesser Daemons appear within [[2d10]] yards of your position, and attack the nearest targets.

rows.name: Fear My Wrath
rows.description: Gain 1+Sin points @Condition[Broken] Conditions.

rows.name: Go On Penance
rows.description: You must go on a Penance.

rows.name: Castigation
rows.description: You are reduced to 0 Wounds (if you are not there already) then gain an @Condition[Unconscious] Condition, which cannot be removed until you regain at least 1 Wound.

rows.name: Do Not Use My Name in Vain
rows.description: You lose the Bless and Invoke Talents for the next [[1d10]]+Sin points days.

rows.name: Rely Not Upon Your Vanities
rows.description: You have all of your trappings removed, leaving you naked. For each Penance you complete, you will have one taken Magical Item returned to you, should you have any.

rows.name: You Abuse My Mercy
rows.description: You lose the Invoke and Bless Talents for the next [[2d10]]+Sin points days.

rows.name: Behold Your Wickedness
rows.description: You suffer excruciating visions of all your failures, which seem to take an eternity, but are over in a moment. Discuss with your GM to build a custom Psychology (see page 190) to reflect your character dealing with the traumatic experience.

rows.name: Thunderbolts and Lightning
rows.description: Your god smites you. You are reduced to 0 Wounds (if you are not there already) and gain the @Condition[Ablaze] condition.

rows.name: Suffer As I Suffer
rows.description: You gain 1+Sin points @Condition[Bleeding] conditions every morning, until you have performed a Penance.

rows.name: Excommunication
rows.description: You lose the Invoke and Bless Talents until you perform 2 Penances; the first Penance returns the Bless Talent, and the second returns the Invoke Talent. All cultists of your god are automatically aware of your circumstance; all Tests to interact with them are automatically Very Hard (-30), and may not be positively modified above this.

rows.name: Prove Your Worth
rows.description: A Divine Servant of your deity appears within [[1d100]] yards and attacks, intervenes, berates, or similar according to the nature of the offended god.

rows.name: I Cast You Out
rows.description: You are abandoned by your god. You permanently lose the Bless and Invoke Talents, and lose all Pray Advances. Further, all cultists of your god are automatically aware of your circumstance; all Tests to interact with them are automatically Very Hard (-30), and may not be positively modified above this.

rows.name: Called to Account
rows.description: You are summoned before your god to face final judgement. Unless you have a Fate Point, you never return. If you spend a Fate Point, you are returned at a point of the GM's choosing, and also suffer the effects of I Cast You Out.
